about_the_game:
A Skill Challenging Retro Fantasy Metroidvania
Welcome to Aldoria, a charming and adventurous land brimming with secrets and magic. Step into the armor of Sir Benedict, a valiant knight on a quest to lift the curse that has befallen his kingdom. The dark wizard Xalazar's malevolent spell has rendered Aldoria a perilous place where even a single point of damage means instant death. Test your mettle in this small and unforgiving yet rewarding adventure.




Master the Elements
Harness the powers of fire, air, earth, and water. Each elemental power unlocks new abilities, allowing you to delve deeper into the treacherous world of Aldroia. Use these powers strategically to overcome obstacles and discover hidden paths.




Challenging Combat[
Every encounter counts. With only one health point, precision and strategy are your best allies. Face off against a variety of monsters and formidable bosses that will test your reflexes and push your skills to the limit. Learn their patterns, adapt your strategies, and emerge victorious to progress further in your quest.




Exploration and Discovery
Traverse diverse environments, from dark caverns to shady forests, and explore the landscape of a kingdom cursed by dark magic. Unlock new areas and pathways as you gain new abilities.




Retro Aesthetic
Immerse yourself in a hand crafted pixel art world, reminiscent of classic 8-bit era games. Enjoy a nostalgic trip back to the golden age of gaming with a modern twist.

For the optimal play experience, a game controller is recommended, but not required.

name: Aldoria

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full OpenGL 4.6 support
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Explore your way through the dangerous fantasy land of Aldoria where a single hit will kill you! Slay monsters and collect magical abilities in this small skill-testing metroidvania.
